author: Leighton Heikell
title: Palmerston North man's dedication to preserving war stories recognised in New Year Honours | Newshub
text:
Patrick Bronte has been made a member of the New Zealand Order of Merit for services to military history. Credits: Newshub
A Palmerston North man who's dedicated his life to preserving the stories of war veterans has been acknowledged in the New Year Honours.
Patrick Bronte has been made a member of the New Zealand Order of Merit for services to military history.
The 43-year-old has been a tetraplegic since 1996 but says hearing how veterans got through the tough times inspired him to get through his.
More from Newshub
New Year Honours list highlights work women are doing to help other women
Sir Trevor's knighthood: A look back at his colourful career in politics Patrick Bronte's achieved something most people never will.
He's received an official email stating he's been made a member of the New Zealand Order of Merit in the New Year Honours for his work preserving military history.
"Rather than recognise myself, I believe that this is an opportunity for me to say that I am just one part of a large mechanism doing a brilliant job at supporting veterans," he told Newshub.
It's a humble response because for 20 years he's been interviewing war veterans and immortalising their survival stories.
His journey began after a survival story of his own. A swimming accident in 1996 left him tetraplegic.
"I don't recognise the disability myself cause that's just who I am now," he said.
And while it's not always easy, it hasn't stopped him. He's travelled the country interviewed hundreds of former soldiers and produced his work with a mouthstick.
"What he has got is a goldmine that we should be cherishing. Patrick is one of these unsung professionals who does it for love," said military historian Chris Pugsley.
Bronte said he accepts his award "on behalf of all those veterans who have served our country and those who are serving our veterans when they come home".
And key among them is Bronte himself. Serving our veterans by ensuring their experiences are never forgotten.

author: Mohammed Shosanya
title: Health Re-Invent Drives Mental Health Care With Innovation,Technology
text:
Olabisi Abayomi,a mental health professional has disclosed her groundbreaking initiative,Health Re-Invent which integrates cutting-edge technology to transform mental health care.
In a statement,Abayomi said she is pioneering this platform to address the growing need for personalized and accessible mental health support.
The statement further disclosed how the initiative leverages data-driven insights to empower individuals and optimize care delivery.
“Health Re-Invent is designed to bridge the gaps in traditional mental health services, particularly by providing early interventions and customized care plans that adapt to the evolving needs of each patient,” Abayomi explained.
The platform utilizes advanced data analytics, enabling precise and timely diagnoses that significantly improve treatment outcomes.
By centralizing data and employing intelligent algorithms, the innovation enhances the accuracy of diagnoses, streamlines treatment processes, and ensures that each individual receives care tailored to their unique needs.” She noted.
“With the integration of centralized data platforms and real-time analytics, we can offer more responsive and effective interventions,” Abayomi said. “This allows us to identify potential issues before they escalate and tailor treatments to support long-term well-being.”
The expert said at its core, Health Re-Invent,emphasizes a patient-centric approach, promoting self-management of mental health conditions by empowering individuals with the tools and information they need to take control of their mental wellness.
She added: “The platform’s holistic model incorporates a range of therapeutic options, from cognitive-behavioral interventions to emotional support activities, all designed to foster resilience and autonomy in managing mental health challenges.
Abayomi’s vision for the innovation addresses the pressing demand for scalable mental health solutions that can be deployed across diverse settings, from hospitals to community clinics.
“One of the strengths of our platform is its scalability,” she noted. “Whether in rural or urban settings, *Health Re-Invent can be adapted to meet the specific needs of different populations, making mental health care more inclusive and far-reaching.”
With her unique blend of practical healthcare experience and academic expertise—holding a Master’s in Management & International Business and a BSc in Economics—Abayomi brings a strategic perspective to the mental health sector.
“The key to driving meaningful change in mental health care lies in the fusion of technology with human-centered care,” Abayomi emphasized.
“ Health Re-Invent is not just about utilizing data; it’s about creating a platform that understands and responds to the human side of mental health challenges.”
The platform’s multifaceted approach also extends to enhancing communication between healthcare providers and patients, ensuring a collaborative and transparent care process. He disclosed in the statement.
Health Re-Invent is no doubt a game-changer in the global mental health arena, providing a solution that aligns with the evolving needs of both patients and healthcare systems.
“Our goal is to make mental health care accessible, proactive, and personalized,” she noted.
Abayomi remains focused on scaling the platform internationally, with plans to integrate even more advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and predictive analytics to further refine care strategies.

author: Alvise Wollner
title: Il parroco accoglie i senzatetto in chiesa, i fedeli raccolgono le firme per cacciarlo
text:
/ Treviso
Il parroco accoglie i senzatetto in chiesa, i fedeli raccolgono le firme per cacciarlo
Rivolta contro don Giovanni Kirschner e la sua politica di accoglienza verso migranti e meno fortunati: "Dopo tanti anni è ora che se ne vada"
La bella storia di accoglienza e solidarietà con protagonista il parroco di Santa Maria del Sile (Treviso) che, nelle scorse settimane, aveva aperto le porte della chiesa a sei migranti e senzatetto rimasti fuori dal dormitorio di via Pasubio, non è andata giù ad alcuni residenti del quartiere trevigiano. In queste ore è stata preparata una raccolta firme cartacea, indirizzata al vescovo Michele Tomasi per chiedere che don Giovanni Kirschner venga sollevato dal suo incarico e sostituito al più presto.
Come riportato da "Antenna 3", diversi residenti sarebbero esasperati dai comportamenti dei sei ospiti attualmente accolti nella chiesa della parrocchia. Al mattino i senza dimora sono stati visti fare i loro bisogni a cielo aperto, uno dei migranti starebbe dormendo in una tenda mentre un altro richiedente asilo si aggirerebbe per il quartiere urlando frasi come "La fine è vicina", rendendo la convivenza tra residenti e senza dimora sempre più difficile. La petizione è stata stampata e la petizione sembra destinata a montare ancor di più nelle prossime ore.

author: HANNAH BROCK hannah.brock@apg-sw.com
title: Walk raises over $5,000 for veterans' retreat
text:
FORT ATKINSON — “When someone you love becomes a memory, that memory becomes a treasure. I am incredibly grateful from the bottom of my heart,” said BethAnn Benson, of the support shown at a recent memorial walk for her son.
The fourth annual “Stay Strong and Embrace the Suck,” memorial walk on Saturday, July 19, honored Beth Ann Benson’s son, Matthew J. Benson.

author: Caidenlrva
title: Quality vs. Price-Why Quality Trumps Price in Kitchen Sinks-Sink Selection
text:
We've encountered this great article about Buying a Cheaper Kitchen Sink directly below on the web and reckoned it made perfect sense to write about it with you on this page.
Kitchen area sinks, what do we know regarding them? We make use of and also abuse them as well as they're most likely one of the most used plumbing component in your home. We know a garbage disposer generally hangs off of it into the cabinet. Besides that, it just beings in your kitchen area ready to carry out the obligations designated no matter how unclean of disgusting. After years of obligation however, it becomes time to simply retire the sink as well as get an additional one. Trouble is that there are lots of products you can pick from and also exactly how do you recognize what one is right for you? The answer naturally is to comprehend what is necessary to you as well as just how each of the kitchen sink products stack up against your demands.
It's obvious that we're all brief on schedule and having somebody else do anything for you in your home is expensive. The point is that time is expensive despite if it's yours or you employ someone. With that in mind, bear in mind that if you require to change your sink yearly or two because you acquired inexpensive, the expenditure is in the labor.
The most affordable sinks today are stainless-steel as well as pressed steel. The lower cost stainless as well as journalism steel are additionally referred to as "apartment" quality. They call them this because apartment or condo proprietors, seeking the most affordable prices tend to utilize these items. If you get on a budget plan as well as your household are not hefty individuals of the cooking area sink, these may be an appealing alternative to extra costly products. Be aware though that the pressed steel sink usually has a repainted surface area that scrapes and chips quickly. These sinks will tend to look old as well as outdated rapidly because of the surface utilized. The stainless likewise scrapes easily yet if cared for properly, it will certainly remain to look acceptable. Cheaper stainless-steel sinks often tend to be constructed from thinner product which implies that water being ran into them and the waste disposal unit will appear a whole lot louder on these more economical versions. These sinks can be found in rimless and leading placed designs.
A certain upgrade to these products is the cast iron kitchen sink. These sinks are constructed from casted metal them do with a porcelain material providing a deep as well as beautiful glow. The surface is long using and with a little occasional shaving, can look wonderful for many years. They can be found in a selection of shades and can be purchased in undercounter mounting or top installing styles. These kitchen area sinks however are heavy as well as far more hard to set up so unless you are exceptionally handy as well as have experience with these sinks, you will certainly need a professional for installation.
An additional sink material that seems to be getting in popularity is the strong surface area type product These are a long lasting product formed into a kitchen sink and often tend to be more of a matte surface. This sort of sink product goes specifically well with more natural coatings in your kitchen. Although not as prominent as cast-iron, these composite kitchen sinks are quickly acquiring a solid following.
Your kitchen area sink is a well made use of piece of plumbing that deserves to be created of quality products. Acquiring just on price will trigger additional expenditure due to having to change the device much more typically. So the very best solution is to acquire top quality and have your Uncle Charlie install it for you.
How to Choose the Best Material for Your Kitchen Sink
Choosing the right kitchen sink is absolutely vital, after all, it’s not something that you replace every year like you might a towel or the pillows on your bed. If you get the wrong sink, it can be a costly and time-consuming mistake to put right. But with such a wide variety of kitchen sink materials out there, and an even wider range of prices, how do you know which one is right for your kitchen? In this guide we’ll be looking at the different types of kitchen sinks and discussing their pros and cons, as well as recommending a few of our favourites.
Stainless Steel Sinks
Stainless steel kitchen sinks are still the most popular sinks in the UK, and with a huge variety of sizes, shapes and even finishes available, there is more often than not a stainless steel sink to suit everyone’s needs. Stainless steel sinks are very low maintenance; they are corrosion and rust resistant, and as long as they are cared for properly and wiped down after every use, they should not stain.
Stainless steel sinks are generally the cheapest option, so if you’re on a tight budget or you’re just looking for a replacement sink to put in a rental property, they are the best choice. Most stainless steel sinks come with lengthy guarantees and as stainless steel sinks are lighter than other options, the way that they can be fitted is also more flexible.
One drawback of budget stainless steel sinks is that they are usually made from thinner stainless steel. This not only makes them more prone to dents and scratches, but it also makes them noisier as well. The thicker the stainless steel, the quieter the sink, but also the more expensive. Some of the more expensive sinks also have special sound absorbing pads under the sink to further reduce the noise. As we’ve discussed, stainless steel is generally the cheapest of the materials, but if you’re looking for a top of the range stainless steel sink, you can expect to pay upwards of £400, compared to around £50-100 for a budget one.
Granite Composite Sinks
Granite composite kitchen sinks are perhaps the trendiest sinks around. With a huge variety of styles and finishes available, with colours ranging from a classic black to a light cream, and even pink and green, there really is a finish that will suit every kitchen décor. Granite composite sinks, like stainless steel sinks, can be mounted in numerous ways, whether top mount or undermount.
Do you enjoy reading up on Buying a Cheaper Kitchen Sink? Leave a remark below. We will be delighted to listen to your thoughts about this posting. We are looking forward to see you back again soon. If you appreciated our article kindly do not forget to share it. Thank you for your time. Visit us again soon.
Affordable? Call now!

author: Oluseyi Taiwo-Oguntuase
title: Lagos Partners Niger, Kwara For Improved Food Security, Waste Reduction
text: The Lagos State Government has kicked off partnership programme with Niger and Kwara states towards bridging food supply-demand gaps under the Produce-4-Lagos initiative. As a market-city State, Lagos is consumer-centric and requires large quantities of food to cater for its population’s needs. Abisola Olusanya, the Lagos State Commissioner for Agriculture during a meeting with her counterparts, Commissioner for Agriculture & Rural Development, Kwara State, Oloruntoyosi Thomas and Commissioner for Industry, Trade, Investment and Private Sector Development, Niger State, Aminu Suleman Takuma at The Secretariat, Alausa, Ikeja assured of sustainability of the partnership stating that the governors of the respective states are already engaging but the meeting is to fine-tune and set the process in motion. MEDICAL CONSULTANTS REVEALED HOW MEN CAN NATURALLY AND PERMANENTLY CURE POOR ERECTION, SMALL AND SHAMEFUL MANHOOD, AND INFERTILITY ISSUES WITHOUT SIDE EFFECTS. STOP THE USE OF HARD DRUG FOR SEX! IT KILLS!!!.. “President Tinubu made an executive order last year July around food security and he has lined up programmes to achieve this, particularly towards stemming the food inflation and ensuring youths are actively engaged in Agriculture and more importantly on how to scale food production. “Kwara shares a border with Nigeria Niger, they have the land, people and capabilities to produce. This is an agenda that we have for a lot of states in Nigeria not just Kwara and Niger states” She stressed that historically, Nigeria is an Agro producing nation before the strength dwindled and it became expedient to reinvigorate the production capability of the states across Nigeria and ensure they are living up to their potential in terms of food production. “We understand our positioning as a state, which is the market for West Africa, so we are making efforts to ensure our people continue to get cheaper, wholesome and quality food and ensure the general prosperity and health of our citizenry.” According to her “There is nothing you bring to Lagos that will not sell, from tubers, to grains, and perishables because there is a target audience for it. It is not so much about reinventing the wheel, there are markets in Lagos for food items that come into the state. “This will mark the beginning of collaboration with other states and subsequently we should be able to see better food pricing, reduced post-harvest loss and wealth creation for our farmers and value chain actors through improved revenues. The Kwara State Commissioner of Agriculture and Rural Development, Oloruntoyosi Thomas applauded the initiative which she described as a major milestone to boost agriculture in Nigeria, close the gaps of unemployment and increase food processing and production. She said: “It is a way of bridging gaps and building communities and empowering our farmers and it is about ensuring that there is food security.

author: 网易
title: 第五批市级非遗传承人名单公布 迟小秋、许娣等戏曲名家入选|昆曲|京剧院|中国戏剧梅花奖_网易订阅
text:
6月12日上午，“匠心传薪火 非遗正青春”——北京市2025年“文化和自然遗产日”非遗宣传展示系列活动启动仪式在北京非遗体验中心举办。
今年是“文化和自然遗产日”启动仪式首次在北京非遗体验中心举办。启动仪式上，北京市文化和旅游局正式公布第五批北京市级非物质文化遗产代表性传承人名单，共123人入选。作为非物质文化遗产的重要承载者和传递者，传承人掌握着非遗项目的专业知识和精湛技艺，其认定工作对完善非遗保护传承体系，增强非遗存续力，将非遗一代代接下来、传下去具有重要意义。本次评审突出三大亮点：一是注重中青年传承人队伍建设，二是项目类别覆盖全面，三是开创首都非遗保护央地共建新模式。此次认定将为北京非遗的传承与发展注入强劲动力，为北京非遗的保护与传承提供坚实保障，为全国文化中心建设谱写新篇章，展现新气象。
其中，北方昆曲剧院的魏春荣、北京京剧院的迟小秋、北京戏曲艺术职业学院的许翠、北京市曲剧团的许娣、中国评剧院的王平等名家悉数入选。
编辑/刘忠禹
